SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion

Interface BufferedMovable

All Superinterfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, DirectionProvider, GameNode, MotionModifier, Movable, Placeable, SpeedProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
Newtonian
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity
public interface BufferedMovable extends Movable
A BufferedMovable extends the interface Movable and support the use of a buffer. With dependency injection, a MotionApplier is injected into a YaegerEntity. The main problem is, however, that this injection takes place after the constructor has been called. Hence, it would not be possible to set the speed, direction and physics related properties of a YaegerEntity from the constructor.

This problem is resolved by introduction of a EntityMotionInitBuffer, which buffers the values set before the dependencies are injected.

    • setDirection

      default void setDirection(double newDirection)
      Description copied from interface: MotionModifier
      Set the Direction. This value is in degrees, where
      • 0 means up
      • 90 means to the right
      • 180 means down
      • 270 to the left

      If one of the values above is set, it is more convenient to use the method MotionModifier.setDirection(Direction), which accepts a Direction as its parameter.

      Specified by:
      setDirection in interface MotionModifier
      Specified by:
      setDirection in interface Movable
      Parameters:
      newDirection - the direction in degrees as a double

    • getBuffer

      Optional<EntityMotionInitBuffer> getBuffer()
      Return the EntityMotionInitBuffer encapsulated in an Optional to be used by this BufferedMovable.

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

      Returns:
      an EntityMotionInitBuffer encapsulated in an Optional
